quotes.quote: Be mindful even if your mind is full.
Live the actual moment. Only this moment is life.
Find your eternity in each moment.
The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness. Mindfulness means being awake. It means knowing what you are doing.
When you open your mind, you open new doors to new possibilities for yourself and new opportunities to help others.
When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
Mindfulness can be summed up in two words:  pay attention.  Once you notice what you're doing, you have the power to change it.
Observe the space between your thoughts, then observe the observer.
Let go of your mind and then be mindful. Close your ears and listen!
The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that â€“ thoughts.
Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it.
Treat everyone you meet as if they were you.
Live mindful of how brief your life is.
Awareness is the greatest agent for change.
Wherever you are, be there totally.
Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
Emancipate yourself from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our mind.
In mindfulness, acceptance always comes first, change comes after.
Smile, breathe, and go slowly.
Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.
Mindfulness is life. Whenever we don't have mindfulness, when we are heedless, it's as if we are dead.
Living 24 hours with mindfulness is more worthwhile than living 100 years without it.
Mindfulness isn't difficult, we just need to remember to do it.
